text: José Saraiva Martins, C.M.F., GCC (born 6 January 1932) is a Portuguese Cardinal of the Roman Catholic Church. He is the Prefect Emeritus of the Congregation for the Causes of Saints, having was prefect from 1998 to 2008. On 9 July 2008, Pope Benedict XVI accepted his resignation as prefect to be succeeded by Angelo Amato. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:Portuguese Roman Catholic bishops
title: José Saraiva Martins
